item.title: Voice of America interview on ChatGPT
item.description: I was interviewed for a Voice of America story (in Russian) on the impact of chatGPT and similar tools. Full story: [https://youtu.be/dFuunAFX9y4](https://youtu.be/dFuunAFX9y4)
